title: Night Picnic
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Kanan-chan, can I please see the list of what to bring for stargazing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah, let me grab it~...... Oh, Ruby-chan, what are these?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>They’re neck pillows. I thought they might be useful for when we lie down to watch.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I see...... Sounds good. Since it’s inflatable, it’ll be easy to carry around.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>And then, this......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>A USB-powered heated blanket? I didn’t know there was such a convenient product.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yoshiko-chan stumbled upon it when she was shopping online. If you plug it into a power bank, it’ll warm up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Awesome, we’ll be perfectly safe from the cold. Now we just need to bring some warm soup!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You’re making it sound like we’re having a night picnic.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Now let’s make a teru teru bozu doll to make sure that there’ll be a clear sky!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
